description:
This course is designed for students without any web development experience. It demonstrated in a step by step process how to setup an online store that is:

  • Completely free
  • No ongoing costs
  • Easy to administrate
  • Highly configurable and scaleable

The course covers off the basics, right through to settings and design options available for those who are more confident.

At the end of this course, you will be able to establish your own online store and have products for sale in a short amount of time.
title: Start Selling Online!
